header.label: contrast_box
header.name: contrast_box
header.description: This is an application specific module: control of the contrast box in the drive test of FGLT, TU Darmstadt.

parameter.name: NUMBER_OF_BOXES
parameter.descr: Insert the number of switch/LED pairs

parameter.name: PWM_FREQ
parameter.descr: Insert the PWM frequency for the LEDs

parameter.name: AUTOMATIC_INCREASE
parameter.descr: If true the led light density will in increase automatically every TIME_TO_INCREASE with INCREASE_VALUE

parameter.name: INCREASE_VALUE
parameter.descr: Insert the value in % which is increased every TIME_TO_INCREASE between 0 to 1023

parameter.name: TIME_TO_INCREASE
parameter.descr: %Insert the value after which time in ms the PWM value is increased by the INCREASE_VALUE

parameter.name: DECREASE_VALUE
parameter.descr: Insert the value in % which is decreased every time the switch is pressed between 0 to 1023

port.name: switch_up
port.descr: switch which increases the LED output

port.name: switch_down
port.descr: switch which decrease the LED output

port.name: pwm_value_changed
port.descr: generate a timestamp if any pwm_on_value has changed
